snippet: I grew up in a duplex lined with old newspapers, videocassettes and a Tetris puzzle of cobwebbed credenzas. Determined to not to become my mother, I organized and cleaned fiercely - until I realized that the mess wasn't the only part of my past that...
abstract: I grew up in a duplex lined with old newspapers, videocassettes and a Tetris puzzle of cobwebbed credenzas. Determined to not to become my mother, I organized and cleaned fiercely - until I realized that the mess wasn't the only part of my past that I didn't want to repeat.

headline.main: A Hoarder's Daughter Yields to a (Little) Mess
